snippet: Royal St. George’s, one of the three clubs used for the British Open with a male-only membership policy, voted to allow female members for the first time.
abstract: Royal St George’s, one of three clubs used for British Open golf tournament, votes to allow female members for first time.
lead_paragraph: Royal St. George’s, one of the three clubs used for the British Open with a male-only membership policy, voted to allow female members for the first time.

headline.main: Royal St. George’s to Allow Women
headline.print_headline: Royal St. George’s to Allow Women
